page.title: 16PETERSHAM FARM
page.content: {Petersham Farm}has 700 chickens that lay 500 eggs per day.The farmer lets the chickens outside.They have some problems with foxes eating the chickens up.The breed of chickens is called Rhode Island Cross.The hens hatch the eggs themselves. In the farm shop they sell goat's milk,eggs,turkeys,lambs and chickens.They only grow hay to feed to the animals in the winter. They have some geese and the oldest is 15 years old. There are 4 fulltime people working at the farm and 3 students that come to help out.The breed of cows they have is called Freisians. They do not have any bulls.They sell and kill some animals themselves.They keep horses,sheep,pigs and the farmer's dog.
